alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 7:47PM MST until February 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW AND STRONG WINDS EXPECTED INTO TONIGHT... .A winter storm will continue to impact the area tonight, bringing heavy snow to portions of the northern Black Hills and foothills, along with much of northeastern Wyoming. On the northwestern and west central South Dakota plains, strong winds and snow will lead to slippery roads and reduced visibilities causing travel difficulties. Snow is expected to taper off from northwest to southeast this evening into tonight. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...The Pennington County Plains and the Southern Meade County Plains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains
